title: Topic 001 Question 039
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that uses the Azure App Service resource provider and contains the roles shown in the following table.
All the role instances operate at full capacity.
You plan to offer Azure Functions in the consumption plan model.
You need to ensure that the integrated system can support the planned offering.
Which additional role instances should you deploy? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
